CutSceneText.Text: Oh, welcome. You came at the right time!! You all know about this person, right? It's [%username], who saved my life.
Of course, all those exploits are very well known in the Red Flame Brigade.
I will get straight to the point, as we are pressed for time.
The intelligence bureau of the Blood Sky Knights, after assessing all the information that have been collected so far, has concluded that a large scale offensive from the Tursin Krall is imminent.
The operational objectives of the Krall this time are extensive and elaborate, so unless we give all we've got it would be difficult to defend against.
The purpose of today's strategy session is to immediately establish a defense plan against the Krall offensive to minimize the losses.
Krall are about to launch such a huge offensive? Do they even have such strength left? Only thing they should be able to do is raiding the civilians transporting supplies...
Unfortunately, what I am saying is true. The commanders have discovered that a few Elyos are handing over military information to the Krall.
Are you telling us that our proud soldiers of Tijerid are siding with the Krall bastards? Who the hell are they...?
One of them is someone you know well. It is the traitor who recently fled after failing to assassinate the soldiers of the Tijerid Elysean Army, Jurid Jeridise.
...Then, I will tell you the plan of our operation. This Krall offensive is clearly directed at all sectors of Tijerid.
First, to stop the enemies coming from the front, the Blood Sky Knights and the First and Seventh Red Flame Squads garrisoned in the city will defend the front position of the Lewindal Stonefort!
Yes sir!
The Second Squad will support the Third, and the Sixth will support the Fifth Squad.
Yes!
The remaining troops of the Red Flame Squads will wait in reserve at the center of Tijerid as well as the Leftwing and Rightwing, and move quickly to reinforce in times of emergency.
I understand.
I've already contacted Erole, just in case.
You need not have done that! Surely you cannot be thinking that the brave forces of Tijerid will be defeated by the likes of Krall?
... Thank you for your hard work, Keydion.
And [%username], I am sorry but there is one thing I would like you to do for me.
Yes.
[Leddins Precian], the captain of the [Wilderness of Roar Outpost] has reported that the Krall nearby are showing suspicious movements.
But as you can see, we have no troops in reserve to investigate the matter.
And the Wilderness of Roar Outpost itself is short of men due to the defense preparations.
I find you as reliable as any regular soldier of Tijerid Army, so I would like you to handle this.
It would be good to go with some companions as well if you find it necessary.
Then, I ask of you to go to [Leddins Precian] in the [Wilderness of Roar] and provide him with assistance.
Understood!
